game.title: Asteroid Soccer 2014
game.description: In the future, scientists have invented Asteroid Soccer, scientifically designed to be the absolutely perfect sport, rendering all other sports completely obsolete. The rules are simple. Push the giant asteroid ball into your opponent's goal by any means possible. Equip yourself with the most overpowered weapons, thrusters, bombs, and anything you can find on the spacefield to dodge, crash, blast, and explode your way to victory.

history.text: The idea for this game was born one day at Glitch City, during one of our communal brainstorming sessions, where we throw around new project ideas. We were on the topic of sport games, when Archie expressed his disdain of the genre. So he decided to make one.

Archie spent about a week making a prototype of what would become Asteroid Soccer. After it's first playtest with fellow Glitch City dwellers, it was clear that the game had potential. He made the decision to finish the game and publish it on the OUYA console. Soon after, Seiji joined the project to help him finish the game in a timely manner.

features.feature: A fast-paced competitive arcade action with simple controls
Up to 6 players on local multiplayer
Many different modes and power-ups for varying degrees of havoc and chaos.
